author: Special Correspondent
text:
N. Subbaiyan, Collector and Director (in charge) of Maharajah Serfoji’s Saraswati Mahal Library here, released a souvenir, brought out by the library, on the occasion of the Mahamaham to be held in Kumbakonam on February 22.

He said the 260-page souvenir, priced at Rs. 300 a piece, has over 50 articles on various subjects by experts in the field. The contents reveal several important facts and aspects of Mahamaham and related temples.

The library is also bringing out a special calendar, priced at Rs. 100.

The first copies were received by PA to Collector (general) Jainulabideen, PA to Collector (accounts) Ganesan and the Library Executive Officer Poonkothai.
title: Library brings out souvenir
